item.description:
Angelo Ruggiero sings a blend of the great standards of Tony Bennett, Bobby Darin, Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin,  Nat King Cole, Engelbert along with the great sounds of the 50’s and 60’s, not to mention artists, such as Neil Diamond and Billy Joel. He is at his best, however, when performing the beloved Neapolitan favorites.

Angelo has  opened for legendary comedian, Pat Cooper. He has appeared with Joe Favale & The Emotions, John Kuse & The Excellents, Emil Stucchio & The Classics, The Paragons, The Dubbs, The Yesterdaze and Larry Chance & the Earls. the Duprees, Barbara Harris & the Toys, Shirley Alston Reeves of the Shirelles, The Fireflies, The Tymes, The Knock-Outs, The Teenagers, and Linda Jensen and The Angels, The Capris, The Eternals

 

Friday, December 7, 2012 - 7:00 PM

Call for reservations Phone: 234-2909

Dominic's of North Haven - Dinner Show

565 Washington Avenue

North Haven, CT

You can add yourselves to the Mariano party so we can all sit together.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Join us for a Dinner Show at Dominics
